column4: hey people, ubuntu has installed ok on my system and all but the included media player app is very very broken on my setup audio and video freeze and lock up after about 30 seconds of playback ..

no, not yet, the app im trying to use is Xfplay i think, ive tryed diffrent renderer options etc but it keeps failing... then again im not sure which renderer i should be useing for my hardware, or which audio device
happen to know which renderer/audio device i should be useing ? if i am running a Nvidia card and VIA Vinyl 6 Trac Channel audio ?
will have to boot the machine again to have a look
how can i tell for sure if X is fully accelerated video wise ?
ahhh.. thats the one .. i think
then you probably don't have the acceleration,install correct drivers ;)
yep... tis a crappy FX 5200 on a VIA EPIA C3 board
i'd risk removing it and let your package manager take it over
